scratcherOnboarding.congratulations.head: Congratulations, {username}! You have shown that you are ready to become a Scratcher.
scratcherOnboarding.congratulations.body: Scratch is a friendly and welcoming community for everyone, where people create, share, and learn together. We welcome people of all ages, races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientations, and gender identities. The next few pages will take you through the community guidelines and explain what this means.
scratcherOnboarding.toBeAScratcher.heade: What does it mean to be a Scratcher?
scratcherOnboarding.toBeAScratcher.body: You might notice on your profile page that you are currently a “New Scratcher”. Now that you have spent some time on Scratch, we invite you to become a “Scratcher”.
scratcherOnboarding.toBeAScratcher.bold: Scratchers have a bit more experience on Scratch and are excited to both contribute to the community and to make it a supportive and welcoming space for others.
scratcherOnboarding.toBeAScratcher.canDo: Here are some things Scratchers do:
scratcherOnboarding.toBeAScratcher.commu: Next, we will take you through the community guidelines and explain what these are.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.respectSe: Become a Scratcher - Treat everyone with respect
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.respectBo: Everyone on Scratch is encouraged to share things that excite them and are important to them—we hope that you find ways to celebrate your own identity on Scratch, and allow others to do the same.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.safeHeade: Scratchers are safe: we keep personal and contact information private.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.safeBody: This includes not sharing real last names, phone numbers, addresses, hometowns, school names, email addresses, usernames or links to social media sites, video chatting applications, or websites with private chat functionality.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.feedbackS: Become a Scratcher - Give helpful feedback
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.feedbackB: When commenting on a project, remember to say something you like about it, offer suggestions, and be kind, not critical.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.remix1Sec: Become a Scratcher - Embrace remix culture
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.remix1Bod: Remixing is when you build upon someone else’s projects, code, ideas, images, or anything else they share on Scratch to make your own unique creation.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.remix2Sec: Become a Scratcher - Embrace remix culture
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.remix2Hea: Remixing is a great way to collaborate and connect with other Scratchers.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.remix2Bod: You are encouraged to use anything you find on Scratch in your own creations, as long as you provide credit to everyone whose work you used and make a meaningful change to it.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.remix3Sec: Become a Scratcher - Embrace remix culture
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.remix3Bod: When you share something on Scratch, you are giving permission to all Scratchers to use your work in their creations, too.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.honestBod: It’s important to be honest and authentic when interacting with others on Scratch, and remember that there is a person behind every Scratch account.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.friendlyS: Become a Scratcher - Keep the site friendly
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.friendlyH: Scratchers help keep the site friendly.
scratcherOnboarding.guidelines.friendlyB: It’s important to keep your creations and conversations friendly and appropriate for all ages. If you think something on Scratch is mean, insulting, too violent, or otherwise disruptive to the community, click “Report” to let us know about it.
scratcherOnboarding.invitation.header: {username}, we invite you to become a Scratcher.
scratcherOnboarding.invitation.body: Scratch is a friendly and welcoming community for everyone. If you agree to be respectful, be safe, give helpful feedback, embrace remix culture, be honest, and help keep the site friendly, click “I agree!”
scratcherOnboarding.invitation.finishLat: You get to decide if you want to become a Scratcher. If you do not want to be a Scratcher yet, just click “Finish Later” above.
scratcherOnboarding.success.header: Hooray! You are now officially a Scratcher.
scratcherOnboarding.success.body: Here are some links that might be helpful for you.
scratcherOnboarding.noInvitation.header: Whoops! Looks like you haven’t received an invitation to become a Scratcher yet.
scratcherOnboarding.noInvitation.body: To become a Scratcher, you must be active on Scratch for a while, share several projects, and comment constructively in the community. After a few weeks, you will receive a notification inviting you to become a Scratcher. Scratch on!
scratcherOnboarding.finishLater.body: By leaving this page, you will not finish the process to become a Scratcher and will stay as a New Scratcher. If you change your mind later, you can always come back via your profile page.
scratcherOnboarding.finishLater.clickBec: Just click on “★ Become a Scratcher!” below your username.
